label: LogisticsLocation
comment: A logistics related physical location or place.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name, expressed as text, of the country for this trade address.
A unique identifier of the country sub-division for this trade address.
The indication of whether or not this logistics location is in a health affected area.
A code specifying the type of this logistics related location.
The unique identifier of a country for this logistics location.

objectProperties.comment: Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
A set of geographical coordinates of a specific point such as the longitude, latitude and altitude.
The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
A servicing party specified for this logistics related location.
A significant occurrence or happening related to an inspection.
A logistics location subordinate to this logistics location.
A physical location or place which is a subordinate location of a location.

referencedBy.comment: A logistics related physical location or place.
The start location from which this logistics service charge should be applied.
The end location at which this logistics service charge is no longer to be applied.
The location of a cargo facility related to this transport event.
The location where this referenced supply chain consignment will be or has been accepted by the carrier.
The location at which this supply chain consignment will be or has been received by the consignee.
A location of a conveyance facility related to this transport event.
The location of this supply chain consignment as declared for customs.
A logistics location specified for a delivery by this referenced transport service.
A disembarkation location for this transport person.
A logistics location where a found stowaway embarked upon the transport means on which they were discovered.
A logistics evacuation location for this MDH illness.
The final destination location for this supply chain consignment.
The baseport location at which this supply chain consignment is to be loaded on a means of transport according to the transport contract.
The logistics location where the supply chain consignment is loaded.
An onward routing location for this supply chain consignment.
A logistics related physical location or place.
The location from which this supply chain consignment was originally despatched.
The location of the place of payment of this logistics service charge.
A logistics related physical location or place.
A related logistics location specified for this referenced transport service.
A logistics related physical location or place.
A logistics related physical location or place.
A logistics location subordinate to this logistics location.
A location of transit for this supply chain consignment.
A transshipment location for this supply chain consignment.
The baseport location at which this supply chain consignment is to be unloaded from a means of transport according to the transport contract.
The logistics location where the supply chain consignment is unloaded.
